name: Add new Google Contacts for every new row in Google Sheets
description: Effortlessly manage your contacts by automating the process of adding new entries from Google Sheets to Google Contacts. With this template, every time a new row is added in your Google Sheets, Make will automatically create a corresponding contact in Google Contacts. This streamlines your contact management, ensuring that your important connections are always up-to-date without manual data entry. Perfect for organizing leads, clients, or any other important contacts directly from your spreadsheet!
